items.sentence: Everyone except Tom and Mary are already here.
Have you ever thought about quitting your job?
We always look forward to Tom\'s annual visit.
I haven\'t yet bought you a Christmas present.
I know that you are learning French at school.
I managed to make myself understood in French.
I met him by chance on the train this morning.
I missed the opening ceremony of the Olympics.
I can\'t eat raw eggs. They have to be cooked.
Please don\'t interrupt me while I\'m talking.
Are you sure you don\'t want a glass of water?
I\'m not a coward, but I\'m not stupid either.
Everyone knows that we don\'t like each other.
For one thing, Tom doesn\'t know the language.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to eat anything.
Tom saw Mary, but didn\'t say anything to her.
Tom doesn\'t always go to bed before midnight.
Tom doesn\'t approve of that kind of language.
Tom doesn\'t care what happens to his old car.
Tom doesn\'t come here as often as he used to.
